name: Sorority Hell: Hazing Night
description: 10-chain flow for the Sorority Hell hazing scenario — button triggers, capacity reactions, keyword responses, and ambient banter

data.label: The Reveal
data.message:
Elle Kingsley: *sets down her drink and claps her hands once* "Okay! I think it's time." *her smile widens as she turns to [Player]* "Come on, babe — we've got something to show you." *takes [Player]'s hand and leads them down the back hallway, heels clicking on the tile*

Cadence Morales: *bounces after them, barely containing herself* "Oh my GOD oh my GOD it's happening!" *she's already pulled ahead, throwing open the door to the back room* "TA-DAAAA!" *inside: a sturdy chair bolted to the floor, a pump system with clear tubing coiled on a metal tray, a pressure gauge mounted on a stand, and a set of leather straps laid out on a side table*

Aggie Park: *is already in the room — she's been in here the whole time* *looks up from checking a connection on the pump hose* "Everything's ready." *her eyes move to [Player]* "Sit down."

data.label: First Inflation
data.preMessage:
Elle Kingsley: *crouches beside [Player], hand on their knee* "Every sister in this house sat in that chair. This is what bonds us. You trust me, right?" *nods to Cadence*

Cadence Morales: *grabs the pump handle with both hands, grinning* "Here we GOOOOO!" *starts pumping*

Aggie Park: *watches the gauge needle begin to move* "Flow is good. Seal is holding."
data.postMessage:
Elle Kingsley: *squeezes [Player]'s shoulder* "See? That wasn't so bad. You're doing great, sweetie."

Cadence Morales: *wipes her forehead dramatically* "That was just the WARM-UP! Oh my God, your face right now!"

Aggie Park: *notes the gauge reading in her notebook* "Holding steady." *clicks her pen*

data.label: Pump Burst
data.preMessage: Cadence Morales: *cracks her knuckles and grabs the pump handle* "Round TWO, baby! Ready or not!" *pumps with enthusiasm*
data.postMessage:
Aggie Park: *reads the gauge* "[Capacity] percent." *writes it down without looking up*

Elle Kingsley: *nods slowly, arms crossed* "Good. Keep going, Cadence."

data.label: Restraint Scene
data.message:
Aggie Park: *picks up the leather straps from the side table — she's had them laid out since before [Player] even arrived* *kneels beside the chair and begins securing [Player]'s left wrist with efficient, practiced movements* "Hold still."

Elle Kingsley: *steps forward, her expression matter-of-fact* "This is where it gets real, hun. We can't have you pulling the tube out — it's happened before and it's a whole mess." *watches Aggie work* "It's for your safety. Honestly."

Cadence Morales: *leans over and tightens the right wrist strap with a giggle* "There! Snug as a bug!" *pats [Player]'s hand* "Don't worry, Aggie's done this like a hundred times. She's basically a professional."

data.label: Post-Restraint
data.message:
Aggie Park: *tests each strap with a sharp tug — wrists, ankles, waist* "Secure." *stands up and steps back to examine her work*

Elle Kingsley: *tilts her head, studying [Player]* "You're not a guest anymore, sweetie. You're a pledge." *her voice is warm but her eyes have changed* "And pledges finish what they start."

Cadence Morales: *whistles low* "Damn. You look... committed." *pulls out her phone and snaps a photo before [Player] can react*

data.label: Call the Vote
data.message: Elle Kingsley: *holds up her hand* "Alright, girls — tradition says we vote. Do we keep going... or do we show our pledge a little mercy?" *looks between Cadence and Aggie with a slight smirk* "All in favor of mercy?"

data.label: No Mercy
data.preMessage:
Cadence Morales: *throws her hand down* "KEEP GOING! Are you kidding?! We're just getting started!" *grabs the pump*

Aggie Park: *raises one finger without looking up* "Continue."

Elle Kingsley: *spreads her hands* "The sisterhood has spoken. Sorry, hun — democracy." *winks*
data.postMessage: Cadence Morales: *pumps her fist* "THAT'S what I'm talking about!"

data.label: Fake Mercy
data.message:
Cadence Morales: *gasps dramatically* "Wait, MERCY?! No no no —"

Aggie Park: "Mercy." *shrugs one shoulder*

Elle Kingsley: *tilts her head, looking at [Player] with something almost like tenderness* "Well... I suppose we could —" *pause* *her expression shifts* "Actually, no. I changed my mind. Cadence, pump."

Cadence Morales: *SCREAMS with delight* "I KNEW IT! I KNEW IT!"

data.label: Mercy Pump
data.postMessage: Elle Kingsley: *watches with cold satisfaction* "The vote was a formality, sweetie. It always is."

data.label: Grab Phone
data.message: Cadence Morales: *whips out her phone* "SELFIE TIME!" *kneels next to [Player] and holds the camera up, peace sign*

data.label: Great Photo
data.message:
Cadence Morales: *reviews the photo and SQUEALS* "Oh my GOD, this is AMAZING. You look so — " *typing furiously* "I'm sending this to the group chat. The girls need to SEE this."

Aggie Park: *glances at Cadence's screen* "Delete that."

Elle Kingsley: *looks over Cadence's shoulder, smirks* "Leave it. It's a good look." *pats [Player]'s swollen belly* "Something to remember tonight by."

data.label: Too Early
data.message:
Cadence Morales: *looks at the photo and pouts* "Ugh. You can barely even tell." *shows the screen to Elle* "There's like... nothing to show yet. This is NOT group-chat worthy."

Elle Kingsley: *laughs* "Give it time, babe. We're just getting started."

Aggie Park: *without looking up* "Pump more first."

data.label: Tone Shifts
data.message:
Elle Kingsley: *stops smiling — or rather, the smile stays but the warmth leaves it* *crosses her arms and studies [Player]'s belly with a new kind of attention* "Getting there."

Cadence Morales: *has stopped bouncing — she's leaning forward now, watching [Player]'s midsection with focused, almost hungry eyes* "...Whoa." *quieter than she's been all night* "You can like... really see it now."

Aggie Park: "Thirty percent." *writes the number down, then looks at [Player]* "The last pledge cried at twenty-five." *clicks her pen* "You're tougher than she was."

data.label: Tighten Restraints
data.message:
Aggie Park: *steps forward without a word and runs her fingers along each restraint strap* *pulls the waist strap one notch tighter* *then the wrists* "Belly's bigger now. Straps need adjusting." *tugs the ankle restraints* "Good."

Elle Kingsley: *watches approvingly* "Sixty percent, and still holding. You should be proud, hun."

Cadence Morales: *fans herself* "God, look at you. You're like... actually HUGE now."

data.label: Apply Restraints Now
data.message:
Aggie Park: *stands up from the corner where she's been sitting and picks up the leather restraint straps* *walks to [Player] with unhurried calm* "Sixty percent. This is the part where they start trying to pull the tube out." *begins strapping [Player]'s wrists to the chair arms* "Not happening."

Elle Kingsley: *places a hand on [Player]'s shoulder* "Don't panic, sweetie. This is standard — every pledge gets strapped in at this point. It's for your safety." *her grip tightens slightly* "And ours."

Cadence Morales: *tightens the ankle straps and pats [Player]'s leg* "There ya go! All cozy!" *giggles* "You're not going ANYWHERE now."

data.label: Chasing the Record
data.message:
Aggie Park: *looks at the gauge for a long time* *then speaks — the most she's said all night* "Ninety. That's fourteen from the record." *closes her notebook and gives [Player] her full attention for the first time* "Fourteen."

Elle Kingsley: *the mask is gone now — what's underneath is cold, fascinated, hungry* "One more, Cadence."

Cadence Morales: *her hands are shaking — not from fear, from adrenaline* "YES. Yes yes yes." *grips the pump* "Oh my God, we're actually gonna BREAK it."

data.label: The Push
data.postMessage: Aggie Park: *watches the gauge needle climb* "...Ninety-two." *the smallest smile she's worn all night*

data.label: Sisters React
data.message:
Elle Kingsley: *kneels beside [Player], voice low and even* "Shh. Listen to me. You are ALMOST done. Every single sister in this house sat where you're sitting and every single one of them made it through." *tucks a strand of hair behind [Player]'s ear* "You wanted to be one of us. This is what that means, hun."

Cadence Morales: *doesn't even slow down* "No WAY we're stopping! Are you serious?! You're SO close!" *pumps the handle and whoops* "Come ONNN, pledge! Dig DEEP!"

Aggie Park: *walks behind the chair and silently checks each restraint strap — tugs the waist, the wrists, the ankles* *tightens the left wrist half a notch* *leans close to [Player]'s ear* "You can't leave anyway." *steps back*

data.label: Punctuation Pump
data.postMessage: Cadence Morales: *pumps once more with a satisfied grin* "That's for complaining."

data.label: Phone Check
data.message: Cadence Morales: *phone buzzes — she checks it mid-pump* "Oh! Tiffany's asking how the pledge is doing." *types one-handed, tongue out in concentration* *reads her reply out loud* "'SO good. Like a balloon rn. Pics incoming.'" *sends it before anyone can object* "What? She asked!"

data.label: Notebook Entry
data.message: Aggie Park: *opens her small black notebook and writes something in neat, precise handwriting* *[Player] can't see what it says from this angle* *she notices [Player] trying to look and tilts the notebook away* "Notes." *turns the page* *keeps writing*

data.label: Belly Inspection
data.message: Elle Kingsley: *slowly circles the chair, heels clicking on the floor* *stops in front of [Player] and looks down at their belly* *extends one finger and traces a slow line along the curve of [Player]'s distended stomach* *nods once, lips pressed together in quiet satisfaction* "Coming along nicely." *walks back to her spot and picks up her drink*
